revisions.rev:
'''Toshio Murashige''' is a professor emeritus of [[University of California Riverside]] in [[plant biology]].<ref>{{cite news|url=http://news.google.com/newspapers?id=DXgyAAAAIBAJ&sjid=XLYFAAAAIBAJ&pg=1540,2538093&dq=toshio+murashige&hl=en|title=Tissue Culture May Aid Crops|date=May 6, 1971|work=[[Google Search]]|publisher=The Palm Beach Post|accessdate=18 July 2011}}</ref>
He is most widely known for his efforts in creating the plant tissue culture medium known as [[Murashige and Skoog medium]].<ref name="Arditti2008">{{cite book|last=Arditti|first=Joseph|title=Micropropagation of orchids|url=http://books.google.com/books?id=zZ34w2WPqoUC&pg=PA8|accessdate=18 July 2011|date=2008-05-19|publisher=John Wiley and Sons|isbn=9781405160889|pages=8â}}</ref>
